query.name: get_gt_locations
query.sql:
SELECT uplink_location_address.name, uplink_location_address.location_address_id, uplink_location_address.address_line_1, uplink_location_address.city, uplink_location_address.phone, MIN(uplink_equipment.status_id) as status_id
FROM uplink_location_address LEFT JOIN uplink_location_equipment ON uplink_location_address.location_address_id=uplink_location_equipment.location_address_id LEFT JOIN uplink_equipment ON uplink_equipment.equipment_id=uplink_location_equipment.equipment_id AND uplink_equipment.deletion_datetime > ?
WHERE uplink_location_address.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_location_address.account_id=? GROUP BY uplink_location_address.name
